name: The Blind Man 2
description:
Sonny finds out his friend, Nala, has come up missing. A mysterious blind man in the neighborhood raises his suspicions. Sonny finds clues in the blind man's home to prove he is the abductor, but this is no ordinary blind man. You must stay quiet and not get caught, or you may end up like the rest.

  • Be the detective.
  • Solve puzzles.
  • Make decisions to dictate the outcome.
  • DON'T GET CAUGHT.
